data.title: Ken Gillespie
data.meta_description: Ken Gillespie is a Canadian artist. Estimated art value is C$4,000.
data.text:
Canadian (1948)

Ken Gillespie is a Canadian artist.

Based on ArtValue.ca records, Ken Gillespie's estimated art value is C$4,000 (*)

Ken Gillespie's work could be available for sale through Art Galleries or at public auction with prices in the range of C$1,000 - C$10,000, or even much higher.

From ArtValue.ca records, the highest price paid at auction for an art work attributed to Ken Gillespie (1948) was C$6,500 - paid for "Untitled" at Hodgins in Calgary on Tue, Nov 24, 2009.

ArtValue.ca has 32 auction art sale records for their art results, with prices in the range of C$1,000 to C$10,000.

Browse All 32 Lots

Notable Works

Saskatchewan NAC Auction House Biography and Notes

Ken Gillespie was born in Vancouver, British Columbia, in 1948. He spent much of his early life in Calgary, Alberta, before moving to the Okanagan region of British Columbia in 2000. Gillspie has held over forty solo exhibitions across Canada, and his work can be found in many important private, public and corporate collections, including the Alberta Foundation for the Arts and the Hyatt Regency (Calgary). He is a senior signature member of the Federation of Canadian Artists. Ken Gillespie currently lives and works in Peachland, British Columbia.
